source_text: Once Greenvale has earned its 80% interest Gempart can opt to contribute pro rata to maintain its 20% interest or 1. Negotiate to sell its interest to Greenvale 2. Convert its 20% interest to a 1.5% NSR.
additional_details: Gempart (NT) Pty Ltd receives the royalty. Greenvale (or the operating entity) would pay it.
